description: Pool cleaner Seth Santoro, is going about his work when homeowner, Remy Cruze comes out to lay in the sun. Seth's attention is now totally on Remy's toned, muscled body as he fights his growing desire for the sexy man. Remy notices Seth's gaze and calls him over to put some oil on his back, knowing it's just the beginning of what he needs from the sexy Latin man. With oil dripping from Remy's chocolate skin, Seth begins exploring the smooth skin and ripples muscles, finding Remy's hard cock ready for him as he pumps the thick member...the pool can wait, Remy deserves his full attention.
title: Rub Some Lotion On Me, Scene #01
